html:
1.16.23  7:28 am   hi bill,
i think i need some advice. i have a synthesizer that i would like to use to make my own music. the problem is that i don't have a daw besides audacity, which i have heard has limitations. almost everyone i look up to uses some variation of logic, but i feel like completely switching to a new os would be even more of a problem. speaking of that, i really don't even have a usable computer because mine is very bad and freezes up trying to load a browser let alone handle a daw or a video editor. anyway i guess i am here to see if you have any advice? i have all these ideas but no way to document them really, and it's getting to be a lot
1.16.23  6:35 am   how are you such a legend?

1.16.23  2:08 am   thoughts on submarines
1.16.23  2:07 am   what's your favourite pasta shape
1.16.23  1:45 am   I'm not looking  forward to the future in general. Can you help me please
1.16.23  1:02 am   Sometimes I feel like it's good to sit in the darkness and contemplate it without resistance. Do you agree with this hypothesis?

1.16.23  12:19 am   What's your opinion on CDs?  I think they strike almost a perfect balance between being something physical to keep on a shelf and toss into your hifi system/car/Discman and also allowing you to easily keep a digital copy to put wherever you please.

1.15.23  11:05 pm   When I listen to 9 8 7, it really feels like (especially the parts with the "yes I feel the things that you've been going through" melody) the persona of the current singer is a real friend but one that's a little larger than life. Like a mentor, someone who knows more than you and that you trust. And it really makes me emotional. Do you think this is what the song is going for?
1.15.23  10:59 pm   dear mr wurtz, what is your favorite collection of syllables?
1.15.23  10:57 pm   Do you consider yourself friendly?

1.15.23  10:37 pm   i appreciate how your music has the dynamics intact, the drums pop out in a nice way and the instruments seem to blend together naturally,

how and when did you decide how to handle dynamics, and how do you avoid going too far with processing the sounds? (compressors, limiters, amps)

1.15.23  7:52 pm   what's the best way to go about developing really good relative pitch? i've been trying to transcribe the chords to various songs, and i think i'm getting better at it, but is there anything else i should be doing? there are a ton of tests online to see if you can identify certain intervals, but do those actually help? any thoughts would be appreciated

1.14.23  2:10 pm   where did all the good times go?
1.14.23  1:06 pm   heck

1.14.23  12:34 pm   are you scared, or are you just a little bit concerned and overwhelmed about something? why is the sun not very bright? there's numbers in the music, can you feel it too? can i go through that rectangular hole in the wall? how's the day been, and did it change yet? what shoes do gamers wear, and what's their attitude? does this plane go off the ground? when things get better, will you take me to september? is that you on the stage? if i go into the high life, how do i climb back out? do you think we should leisurely exit, and venture elsewhere? the world's not ending tomorrow, right? are you finally starting to feel more comfortable? shall we amount to something? and, finally, did you know that a good percentage of rabbits are in hats?
1.14.23  11:42 am   how do you feel about parasocial relationships

1.14.23  11:31 am   sometimes when i think i'm a fucking mess who can't do anything, i think about some of the reality videos where you felt similarly. was that one of the reasons you posted that stuff?
